original_title: Beenie Man & Bounty Killa: Peace Love & Unity
overview: Get ready to party with this sizzling collection of live performances that'll have your whole house shaking. Former dancehall DJ rivals Beenie Man and Bounty Killa bury the hatchet and present this showcase of talent in a spirit of unity. Performers include some of the hottest ragga and reggae DJs around, including Razor, Nesbeth, Tony Curtis, Bling Dawg, Tanto Metro and Devonte, Predator, Kiprich, Wayne Marshall and more.
title: Beenie Man & Bounty Killa: Peace Love & Unity
